title: John Coltrane - First Meditations (for quartet) 1965 / 1977
description:
"First Meditations (for quartet)", recorded in September 1965, released in 1977, is a quartet version of John Coltrane's "Meditations" suite, which was recorded 2 months later and where he would add drummer Rashied Ali and tenor saxophonist Pharaoh Sanders.

A wonderful set of compositions.

Recorded at the Van Gelder Studio, Englewood Cliffs, New Jersey on September 2, 1965 
and West Coast Recorders, San Francisco, California on September 22, 1965 *
